name: Wrathful Skott
description: Skott, who gathered all the filming resources to become the greatest protagonist of all protagonists. With his consciousness and soul scattered by a Servant, he seeks revenge from the Trailblazer in a thousand different appearances.

skills.name: Wolf's Agony
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to one target and adjacent targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Rabid" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Fury
skills.description: Deals minor Fire DMG to all targets, with a high chance of inflicting "Burn." This ability can only be used while in the "Rabid" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Overtime
skills.description: Makes one random friendly unit and this unit switch to the "Rabid" state and applies "<u>Overworked</u>" to them. This can only be used in the "Mocked" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Charity
skills.description: Increases all targets' ATK. This ability can only be used while under the "Mocked" state.

skills.name: Wolf's Retreat
skills.description: After being attacked, switches the "Rabid" state to the "Mocked" state. When in "Mocked" state, will not switch states after being attacked.

skills.name: Wolf's Intimidation
skills.description: When attacking, this unit has a chance to Slow the target.
